message: You can't get everything, Alice! I'll give you a fair share, but not 50/50
I'd like more than 40% of the pie
I'll take a bit more, but still leaving you with a good chunk
You're getting greedy, Alice! I'll give you a small share, but I'm taking the majority
No way, I want a fair share, not a tiny slice!
I'll compromise, but I need a bit more to make it worth my while
You're really pushing your luck, Alice! I'll give you a tiny share, but I'm taking the lion's share
No way, I'm not settling for a tiny fraction of the pie!
I'm willing to take a bit less, but I need a decent chunk of the money
You're really lowballing me, Alice! I'll give you a small token, but I'm taking the majority
You've got to be kidding me! I'm not settling for a tiny token!
I'm willing to take a bit less, but I need a significant chunk of the money
You're really desperate, Alice! I'll give you a tiny token, but I'm taking almost everything
You're not even trying to be serious anymore. I'm out of patience!
I'm taking what's left, it's my last stand
You're really going all-in, Alice! I'll give you a single dollar, but I'm taking the rest
You're not even trying to be funny anymore. I'd rather walk away with nothing than accept this joke of an offer.
